for_sales.sales_text: Oysterman 16 gaff cutter built  Bar Creek Yacht Station, 1979. Two berth cabin version, spirit stove, portapotti loo, Lombardini 8/10 hp diesel inboard engine (rebuilt 2014), full suit of sails including jack yard topsail. All in good order and fully equipped for cruising inc. Zodiac inflatable. Lying Ashore River Vilaine South Brittany. Vendor can negotiate reduced travel costs from UK for viewing and provide accommodation.

boat.full_description: Designed on the lines of oyster dredgers in Falmouth, 'Petranella' has cruised between The Scillies and Ipswich, including Calais. She was class winner in the North Kent and Medway Area race, 1992 and awarded the Commodore's pennant.
boat.name: Petranella

ownerships.note: Owned by David Keller from 1990 until his death. Then sold to a non member who kept her on the Isle of Wight. She sold her to Adrian Sharpe. When owned by Dave Keller she was sailed very enthusiastically along the south coast of England. In 2016, she was sold in France, where she remains on the Trieux River.
